text:
Is there anyway to make your theme templates *searchable by label…?* I just discovered that when you choose template (when creating a website page for instance), you can only search on the *filename*! So you can’t simple type “start page” if your template is named “start-page.html”!

Is the recommendation to name the files like normal names, eg “Company Name Start Page.html” instead of kebab case? What’s the “label” attribute doing in that case… :face_with_rolling_eyes:
